label: Model/Source Registration
description:
## CMIP7 Model/Source Registration

Register a climate model or data source for CMIP7.

For CMIP7, this becomes the **source_id** in file metadata and directory structures.

label: Source ID
description:
The unique identifier for this model or data source.

**Naming convention:**
- Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
- Include institution prefix (recommended)
- Include model name and version
- Examples: cnrm-esm2-1, hadgem3-gc31-mm, ukesm1-0-ll

Note: This will become the @id and source_id in metadata.

label: Model Description
description:
Comprehensive description of the model or data source.

**For models, describe:**
- Overall model structure and components
- Resolution characteristics
- Key physics and parameterizations
- Version history or relationship to other models

**For obs/reanalysis, describe:**
- Data source and collection methods
- Processing and quality control
- Spatial and temporal coverage
- Version information
placeholder: Provide detailed description of the model/source...

label: Activity ID(s)
description:
MIP activities this model/source will participate in.

**For models**: Select all activities you plan to contribute to
**For obs/reanalysis**: Select activities where this data will be used

* Select Multiple *

label: Cohort
description:
Publication status or data availability.

**Options:**
- Published: Peer-reviewed model description exists
- Registered: Model registered but paper in prep
- Preliminary: Early development, may change

**For obs/reanalysis:**
- Published: Publicly available
- Registered: Available with registration
- Preliminary: Pre-release version

* Select Multiple *

label: Institution(s)
description:
Institution(s) responsible for this model/source.

Select all that apply for multi-institutional efforts.

Institutions must be registered in the WCRP-universe repository.

* Select Multiple *

label: License
description:
Data license type.

**Most common:**
- cc-by-4.0: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0
- cc-by-sa-4.0: Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0
- cc0-1.0: Public domain dedication

For obs/reanalysis, specify applicable license.

* Select Multiple *

label: Model Documentation Reference
description: Please register your EMD and then update this field.

label: Issue Handling Metadata
description:
## Issue Handling Metadata

These options control how the submission is processed.

In most cases, these do not need to be changed.

label: Issue Type
description: This is pre-set and cannot be changed.

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
